name: Valve Steam Deck OLED 512GB Handheld Gaming Console
description: Display: 7.4” diagonal HDR 90Hz OLED DisplayProccessor: AMD Zen 2 4c/8t 2.4-3.5GHz (6nm)RAM: 16GB LPDDR5, Storage: 512GB NVMe SSDFeatures: 6-Axis IMU Gyro Sensor, Tri-band Wi-Fi 6E

Specifications.Features:
Contrast ratio: > 1,000,000 : 1
Color gamut: 110% P3
Response time: <0.1 ms
High performance touch
Gamepad controls:
A B X Y buttons
D-pad
L & R analog triggers
L & R bumpers
View & Menu buttons
4 x assignable grip buttons
Thumbsticks: 2 x full-size analog sticks with capacitive touch
Haptics: HD haptics
Trackpads: 2 x 32.5mm square trackpads with haptic feedback, Pressure-sensitivity for configurable click strength
Gyro: 6-Axis IMU
Specifications.CPU Type:
6 nm AMD APU
CPU: Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz (up to 448 GFlops FP32)
GPU: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz (1.6 TFlops FP32)
Specifications.RAM: 16 GB LPDDR5 on-board RAM (6400 MT/s quad 32-bit channels)
Specifications.Card Slot: UHS-I supports SD, SDXC and SDHC
Specifications.Speaker: Stereo with embedded DSP for an immersive listening experience
Specifications.Audio Features:
Dual microphone array
Multichannel audio via DisplayPort over USB-C, standard USB-C, or Bluetooth 5.3
Specifications.Wi-Fi: Tri-band Wi-Fi 6E radio, 2.4GHz, 5GHz, and 6GHz 2 x 2 MIMO, IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax
Specifications.Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.3 (support for controllers, accessories and audio) Dedicated bluetooth antenna
Specifications.USB: Multichannel audio via DisplayPort over USB-C, standard USB-C

PD3.0 Type C power supply, 45W
2.5m cable
